CREATE TABLE game_schedule (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    game_time TIME,
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    games_played INT,
    points_scored INT
);

CREATE TABLE team_stats (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_games_played INT,
    total_wins INT,
    total_losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE broadcast_schedule (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    broadcast_date DATE,
    broadcast_time TIME,
    broadcast_channel VARCHAR(50)
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT team_name, total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM team_stats WHERE total_wins >= 15 AND total_losses < 5;

### STATEMENT

SELECT game_date, COUNT(game_id) AS num_games, SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins FROM game_schedule gs JOIN team_stats ts ON gs.home_team = ts.team_name GROUP BY game_date;

### STATEMENT

SELECT ts.team_name, COUNT(bs.broadcast_id) AS num_broadcasts FROM team_stats ts JOIN game_schedule gs ON ts.team_name = gs.home_team JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id GROUP BY ts.team_name;

### STATEMENT

SELECT ps.player_name, ts.team_name, ps.points_scored FROM player_statistics ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.team_name = ts.team_name WHERE ts.total_wins > ts.total_losses;

SELECT gs.game_id, gs.game_date, ts.team_name AS home_team, ts.total_wins AS home_team_wins, bs.broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule gs JOIN team_stats ts ON gs.home_team = ts.team_name JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id;

SELECT player_name, position, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id UNION SELECT player_name, position, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE position = 'Guard';
